data.title: UEA prizewinners and nominees 1970 – 2021
data.text:
The academic year 2020-21 marked the 50th anniversary of the UEA Creative Writing programme, which was launched in 1970-71 with a single student, Ian McEwan.

Over the first fifty years of the programme a great many of its alumni achieved publication, and many of those won or were nominated for literary awards, including the Nobel Prize in Literature, the Booker Prize and the Costa Book Award.

This is a list of those authors and their awards.
